headline: Mag 7 stocks are 'back in favor' among retail investors: Robinhood
summary: Robinhood's (HOOD) chief brokerage officer, Steve Quirk, joins Market Domination host Josh Lipton to talk about trends among retail investors before 2025 draws to a close. Watch the video above to hear more about retail investor behavior on the platform. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

headline: Is Robinhood (HOOD) Quietly Shifting From Broker to Betting-Led Super App With Prediction Markets?
summary: Earlier this month, Robinhood Markets unveiled major upgrades to its fast-growing prediction markets platform, expanded sports event contracts, and enhanced its Cortex AI assistant, while analysts highlighted prediction markets as one of the company’s fastest-scaling revenue lines. By pushing into prediction markets, sports-style contracts, and AI tools while acquiring infrastructure like MIAXdx, Robinhood is repositioning itself as a broader financial and wagering platform rather than just...

headline: Bitcoin and XRP Struggle Again. Why Coinbase, Robinhood, and Strategy Stocks Are Rising.
summary: Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies remained stuck in a rut Thursday but crypto-exposed stocks were set for gains.  Bitcoin  was trading at $87,348, rising 0.7% over the past 24 hours, according to CoinDesk.  Other digital assets were struggling Thursday–  Ethereum  the second largest crypto, was down 2.6% to $2,848, while popular altcoin  XRP  fell 2.3% to $1.86.

content.title: Bitcoin and XRP Struggle Again. Why Coinbase, Robinhood, and Strategy Stocks Are Rising.

Other digital assets were struggling Thursday–  Ethereum  the second largest crypto, was down 2.6% to $2,848, while popular altcoin  XRP  fell 2.3% to $1.86.

headline: Coinbase System Upgrade: Here Are Biggest Takeaways in Latest Announcement
